client: DUT MMI - Web developement and numeric project
brief: We have searched on Pinterest and the low-poly style for inspiration for our perfect room. Then we used 3Ds Max to build light elements. Then we imported them with the Three JS Librairy. We were instructed to build our perfect room office, but Timoth√©e and I have added a story-line to our project to make it more authentic.

reflection.text: We have started by listing all of our favorite items and sketching the room. Then we have equally divided the different elements. Then we put all different objects in one file.

We created different use-case and fake clues to mislead the viewer. The vault was given by the teacher but we built a program which declares if the combination is the right one and decides to open the door.
We are currently working on the collisions between the viewers and the objects. We are also working on shadows and colored lights.
